message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer?
I appreciate the value of the product you're offering, but I believe we can come to a more mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a price of $8,000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,500
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to stick to my initial proposal of $8,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
I understand that you're sticking to your initial offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise at $8,200
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort to find common ground. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $8,100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8,150, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I would like to propose a final price of $8,125 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8,200, but I'm not sure I can go any higher
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to make one last attempt to reach an agreement. I propose a price of $8,175 for the product.
